page.title: 19Tourism in Stackpole
page.content: For such a scenic area,Stackpole is remarkably untouched by tourism.The local beach,Barafundle,has become noticeably busier during the last ten years and there have been three small developments. 1.The National Trust has renovated some old outbuildings at Stackpole Quay and converted them into holiday cottages. 2.The National Trust has renovated some outbuildings at the Home Farm and opened an outward bound centre for primary schools. 3.An independent trust has renovated other outbuildings at the Home Farm and created holiday homes for the disabled. Three private houses provide bed and breakfast accommodation during the summer months.
